Package pokemon

Class Pokemon

java.lang.Object
pokemon.Pokemon
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bulbasaur, Charmander, JigglyPuff, Pikachu, Squirtle
public class Pokemon
extends java.lang.Object
This is a pokemon entity with stats for level, health, and move factors.
Author:
Rishi Zamvar

  • Constructor Details

    • Pokemon

      public Pokemon()
      Constructs a pokemon

    • Pokemon

      public Pokemon​(char type, int maxHealth, double level)
      Constructs a pokemon with the given health, level, and type
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the pokemon. The char 'a' represents air, 'f' represents fire, 'e' represents earth, 'w' represents water, and 'g' represents grass;
      maxHealth - the maximum amount of health the pokemon can have
      level - the starting level of the pokemon
